breathing.name: 2-Minute Breathing
breathing.description: Quick breathing exercises to help you feel calmer and more centered

grounding.name: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
grounding.description: Notice 5 things you see, 4 you can touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste to reconnect with the present

guidedBreathing.name: Guided Breathing
guidedBreathing.description: Follow along with breathing patterns designed to reduce stress and anxiety

progressiveMuscleRelaxation.name: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
progressiveMuscleRelaxation.description: Tense and release different muscle groups to melt away physical stress

peacefulVisualization.name: Peaceful Visualization
peacefulVisualization.description: Imagine yourself in calm, soothing places to quiet your mind

thoughtLabeling.name: Thought Labeling
thoughtLabeling.description: Learn to observe anxious thoughts without getting caught up in them

stressReliefBubbles.name: Stress Relief Bubbles
stressReliefBubbles.description: Pop virtual bubbles to distract your mind and release nervous energy

soundTherapy.name: Sound Therapy
soundTherapy.description: Calming sounds and frequencies to help your mind and body relax
